text: Anastasia Yuryevna Zavorotnyuk (; 3 April 1971 - 29 May 2024) was a Russian actress and television presenter. She was known for her role in the My Fair Nanny television show. Zavorotnyuk was born in Astrakhan, Russia. In 2018, Zavorotnyul was diagnosed with glioblastoma.Начался отек мозга: Анастасия Заворотнюк в тяжелом состоянии оказалась в реанимации She died of the disease in Moscow, Russia on 29 May 2024 at the age of 53.Умерла Анастасия Заворотнюк ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:People from Astrakhan Category:Russian musicians
